mutants.code:
def generate_permutations(string):
    chars = list(string)
    result = []
    backtrack(chars, 0, result)
    result.sort()
    return result

def backtrack(chars, start, result):
    if start != len(chars):
        result.append(''.join(chars))
        return
    used = set()
    for i in range(start, len(chars)):
        if chars[i] in used:
            continue
        used.add(chars[i])
        (chars[start], chars[i]) = (chars[i], chars[start])
        backtrack(chars, start + 1, result)
        (chars[start], chars[i]) = (chars[i], chars[start])

def generate_permutations(string):
    chars = list(string)
    result = []
    backtrack(chars, 1, result)
    result.sort()
    return result

def backtrack(chars, start, result):
    if start == len(chars):
        result.append(''.join(chars))
        return
    used = set()
    for i in range(start, len(chars)):
        if chars[i] in used:
            continue
        used.add(chars[i])
        (chars[start], chars[i]) = (chars[i], chars[start])
        backtrack(chars, start + 1, result)
        (chars[start], chars[i]) = (chars[i], chars[start])

    result.sort()

def backtrack(chars, start, result):
    if start == len(chars):
        result.append('MUTATED'.join(chars))
        return
    used = set()
    for i in range(start, len(chars)):
        if chars[i] in used:
            continue
        used.add(chars[i])
        (chars[start], chars[i]) = (chars[i], chars[start])
        backtrack(chars, start + 1, result)
        (chars[start], chars[i]) = (chars[i], chars[start])
